Class ServerConstants

      • TIMEOUT_BASE

        public static final int TIMEOUT_BASE
        The exponent base to be used when calculating timeouts. New timeouts will be TIMEOUT_BASEnumberOfPreviousTimeouts+1 seconds
        See Also:
        RequestService.request(common.networking.ssl.SSLConnection, java.lang.String, int), Constant Field Values
